channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned for 8 weeks, 5th September
item.description:
This car has been left and unmoved for more than 8 weeks. The road is already hard enough to park down without other cars being left for longer than a few weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elm Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dried up dog fouling in front of 77 Fernhead Road, 5th September
item.description:
Dried up dog on the pavement which is in front of 77 Fernhead Road. The fouling also goes around the corner and slightly into Shirland Road. The who area needs a through wash down. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly posted adverts all over both bus stops on hanover park, 5th September
item.description:
Please remove all the 'man and van' posters that have been put up over the bus stops on hanover park
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hanover Park, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Resident parking, 5th September
item.description:
Since local CPZ Was introduced it has been so difficult for residents in Avondale road Montpelier Road,Abingdon and Cromwell to find parking places.as Residents in Etchingham park road and other roads with restrictions are taking our places.The problems have just been passed on.Are their plans for CPZ in the aforementioned roads
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Finchley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing domestic waste attracting vermin, 5th September
item.description:
The new illegal/unregistered school in unit 13 Theydon Rd is dumping waste in these commercial waste bins from the previous business that was here. Bins are not being collected and overflowing with rats and foxes going through them at night time

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Matresses and NItrous Oxide Use, 5th September
item.description:
I have already reported these fly tipped mattresses on the 10th floor communal balcony of Lovell house. I received a message saying the issue had been resolved however the mattresses are still there and are now being used as a place to do drugs.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shrubland Road, Hackney, London

item.title: St George’s Flag graffiti, 5th September
item.description:
There are many flags painted all over the park, including on signage and the bark of trees. There has been a spate of fascist flag painting throughout the country and I’m very ashamed to see it in our neighbourhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Well Hall Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
